content: crochet a double-thick hot pad for your kitchen with this **magic square potholder** pattern also known as origami potholder this hot pad has a unique and easy construction the pattern is very beginner-friendly and works up in no time with just one skein or ball of cotton yarn *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** 5 0-mm h/8 usa 6 uk crochet hook aran 4 medium cotton yarn tapestry needle **yarn** i used 1 skein of drops loves you 8/8 93 yds 85 m per 50 g feel free to use any comparable yarn that meets gauge **size** 7 18 cm **gauge** 18 blo single_crochet for 15 row in 4 10 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
